commands.name: manage-alarms
commands.title: My Alarms
commands.description: View, edit and remove your scheduled alarms

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Setting up Raycast Alarms...' && mkdir -p ~/.raycast-alarms/logs && (command -v jq >/dev/null 2>&1 || echo 'WARNING: jq is not installed. Please install it using brew install jq') && chmod +x ./assets/scripts/trigger-alarm.sh ./assets/scripts/manage-crontab.sh ./assets/scripts/install.sh && ./assets/scripts/install.sh
